description:
Source code for website at https://paloz.marum.de/AstroComputation/index.html

A TokamakUI and SwiftWasm based WebApp to calculate orbital solutions with a tidal dissipation and dynamical ellipticity Earth model based on Laskar et al. (1993), providing solutions for La1993; La2010a,b,c,d; ZB2017e; and ZB2018a.

Based on original code by Laskar et al., 1993.
title: OrbitalCalculations/AstroSolution: Zenodo Release v0.0.2
